description: This file contains unit tests for the agent's tool calling capabilities, specifically testing the integration of custom weather-fetching tools with various parameter configurations within the agent framework.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to call a parameterless tool and process its response.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests the agent's handling of a tool with an optional parameter.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_untyped_parameters
methods.description: Tests the agent's handling of a tool with an untyped parameter.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to handle a list parameter in a tool.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_union_parameters
methods.description: Tests the agent's handling of a tool with parameters of union types and optional parameters.
